jobs.title: Senior React Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Front-End Developer to join our team in Colombo, Sri Lanka. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with experience working with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React or Angular.

company.name: TechVision Lanka
company.description: TechVision Lanka is a leading IT solutions provider specializing in web and mobile development. Our goal is to deliver innovative and high-quality digital solutions for businesses across industries.

jobs.title: Front-End Engineer (React & Redux)
jobs.description: Join our team as a Front-End Developer in Colombo. We are looking for a motivated individual with a passion for crafting beautiful and responsive web applications. Experience with UI/UX design principles and a strong attention to detail are highly desirable.

jobs.title: React.js Developer
